entry.title: Through Another's Eyes
entry.summary:
Author: Kilani

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,599Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 32

Summary: Stiles wakes up in a world that isn’t his—in a body that shouldn’t be his. Familiar faces surround him, yet everything feels wrong. Worst of all? He’s engaged to Derek Hale—a man he’s sure doesn’t like him, let alone want to marry him. With memories that aren’t his own and a past that doesn’t add up, Stiles must unravel the truth before he loses himself completely.

entry.title: The Mummy
entry.summary:
Author: Killmesoftly_s

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,444Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 131

Summary: Inspired by my all time favorite movie, The Mummy (1999)When Scott, -Stiles’ step brother and best friend-brings him a key found within a Pharohs crypt depicting the curse of the infamous city; Hamunaptra, a trip is set.It’s in Cairo that the rugged and frustratingly handsome Derek Hale, who is the only living man to know how to find the city of the dead, promises to take him.Death is only the beginning and Stiles is ready for his adventure, stupid hunters and curses be damned.Rated mature for one detailed sex scene.

entry.summary:
Author: LucielDark

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,823Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 7

Summary: Wanting to stop thinking about "what could have been" if he had stopped trying to hook up with Lydia and instead hooked up with all the other attractive men he ever met, Stiles begins writing down all the fantasies he ever dreamed of having with the men in the pack. However, he wrote all that in a magical book that would make him live out each of those fantasies in his "dreamscape", enjoying a reality with a much better style(s).1. entry.title: they were built on ancient legends

Author: jessmy

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,893Chapters: 16/16Kudos: 2,064

entry.title: Habits Of My Heart
entry.summary:
Author: sunrue

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 42,893Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 332

Summary: "Stiles." His voice came out gruff, lower than usual, "If everything is too loud and you can't find a place to be safe, come and find me. I will be your quiet."For once, Stiles had nothing to say. He felt his heart speed up, felt his mouth gaping like a fish. Derek's hand was still gripping his wrist - it felt like a lifeline. An anchor, keeping him grounded."I will." He replied eventually. He wasn't sure if he was intending to stick to that or not, but he vowed to at least try. "Thank you, Derek." They could both hear the words that were going unspoken, the 'and not just for the ride'. He didn't need to say it.--Or, the one where Derek Hale was suddenly everywhere, and Stiles was suddenly uncertain.

entry.title: The Space Between Us
entry.summary:
Author: milkyway

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,950Chapters: 8/10Kudos: 43

Summary: Derek Hale has spent most of his life keeping people at arm’s length. Stiles Stilinski has spent most of his life ignoring personal space entirely. Somewhere between late-night phone calls, flirty text messages, Virginia Woolf quotes, a weekend getaway and a long walk on the beach, they find a way to meet in the middle.Or:Derek learns how to have things—love, warmth, home—without the fear of losing them. Stiles makes it his life’s mission to ensure Derek is thoroughly overwhelmed by affection. There are hand-holding lessons, aggressive cuddles, an alarming amount of literary analysis, a cooking-induced identity crisis, and way too much texting from work.It’s slow, messy, and absolutely inevitable.

entry.title: Sins of the Mother
entry.summary:
Author: sifshadowheart

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 219,615Chapters: 42/?Kudos: 1,529

Summary: Stiles Stilinski was never supposed to be anything other than plain, boring, vanilla human.Blood, magic, and tears had been sacrificed since long before his birth to ensure it.Unfortunately, no one ever told Stiles that - or the psychopaths that liked to set up shop and wreak havoc in Beacon Hills.Psychopaths who should have been a little more careful about who they targeted.And exactly what kind of monsters were hiding inside their blood and bones.

entry.title: The Alpha's List
entry.summary:
Author: Vampire_Finch

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,236Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 192

Summary: In the Game of Love, he Made the Rules. The Honorable Derek Hale, Marquis of Redbridge.He is aristocratic, excessively handsome, excessively wealthy, aloof, reserved, arrogant and the powerful Alpha of one of the most renowned packs in the country. He has been an elusive prize for years, the target of desperate society Omega and their matchmaking mothers. But he is not swayed by flirtatious smiles and fine looks, social climbers and fortune hunters. He wants more.When his lack of an Omega causes concern to his mother, uncle and pack a remedy is suggested in the form of a suitable match. Derek draws up a list of qualifications and attributes for his future mate. Can any Omega hope to win the heart of such a demanding bachelor and cynic?Stiles Stilinski the Omega son of a clergyman can only try his best. The Marquis is not sure whether he has discovered the perfect Omega… Or the been the victim of a cruel hoax.

entry.title: Remember Me
entry.summary:
Author: Warlock_Nerd

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,879Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 79

Summary: Much to Eddie’s dismay, his family decided to throw him a ‘Welcome Home’ party when he officially moved to Texas. Everyone was there - his parents, Chris, his siblings, his aunts, uncles, cousins, nieces, nephews, his grandparents and even some friends of friends.But when he sees someone he hadn’t seen in over fifteen years, hidden memories and secret emotions come flooding back.“Long time no see, huh, Eddie?” Said the man.Derek Hale.His old best friend.Warnings - internalized homophobia, homophobia, catholic guilt, repressed memories and queer awakening.AKA - Eddie finally realises he’s gay, in love with Buck and wants to go back home. :3(I’ve snuck in some Sterek because I wanted to. Not really important to the fic. Just for fun :3)

entry.title: Scar Tissue
entry.summary:
Author: Halevetica

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,856Chapters: 21/55Kudos: 289

Summary: Derek hasn't worked with a partner in years, it's easier to keep his secret if he's alone. However, a new case against a family he's been wanting to take down falls into his lap, only it comes with a catch, he must accept a new partner. He doesn't know if he can work with someone again. But he's desperate to take down the family that took everything from him. All he has to do is keep his new partner in the dark. But what if his new partner has a secret of his own?

entry.title: Stardust and Violets (Wolfsbane and Moonlight)
entry.summary:
Author: Heavenly_Bodies

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 44,744Chapters: 7/7Kudos: 25

Summary: Stiles was about to turn twelve when he found what others would call his soulmate. By the time he was thirteen he had lost him, lost his mother, and almost lost himself.Before he graduated high school he had become the Left Hand to his alpha best friend; the one who kept the monsters at bay- human and supernatural alike.Derek was fifteen when he lost his first girlfriend, drove away his best friend, and fell for the hunter that would kill his family. He was an orphan at sixteen, beta in a pack of three.Accepting the mantle of alpha after graduating college, he found himself with three new betas of his own, along with his uncle- that’s when things got interesting.A story of...Sparks and soulmates, wolves and hunters.Murder and revenge, protection and magic.Stardust and violets, wolfsbane and moonlight.

entry.title: Guided by a Beating Heart
entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 56,649Chapters: 43/54Kudos: 56

Summary: (Further continuation of Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU)After defeating their second Goa'uld System Lord in less than a year, the residents of Beacon Hills must adapt to their ever-changing world.Cora Hale has broken the family curse, but now she must continue her work of rehabilitating the Hale-Littlefield Pack while keeping Beacon Hills safe for all its residents.Stiles Stilinski continues his journey of recovery and self-discovery after his possession.Derek Hale faces new challenges as he starts going on offworld missions through the Stargate.
